title: 10-sai Kaa-san
description:
Wauman (Nagomi) who lost her mother due to a water accident at the age of 5. A decade later, a mysterious primary school student Mr. Ano Mari appears before him. She said that she is a reincarnation of her mother and starts to live with Wakami. Two new parent-child relationships are established.
From [url=https://comic-flapper.com/product/ten-year-oldmother/]Comic Flapper[/url].
